raw_body: Called to rest 29.04.2024. Precious son of (late) Thomas Wilson and Yogam Wilson, beloved husband of Raji, loving father of Rishan, brother of Prem and Yogen, brother-in-law of Kasturi and Vanathi, Uncle to Amrith, Ashvindh, Anushi, Mathushi and Thanushi. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour, Borella. The viewing for the public will be on the 2nd of May from 9.00 a.m. onwards, there will be a service at the parlour at 3.30 p.m. on the
